## Step 4: Run the Keygen
 
In order to generate a serial number and an activation code for CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6, you need to run the keygen. To do that, double-click on keygen.exe and wait for it to load. You will see a window with several fields and buttons.
 
In the "Product" field, select "CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6" from the drop-down menu. Then click on "Serial Number" button to generate a random serial number. Copy this serial number and paste it into the installer window where it asks for a serial number. Then click on "Next".
 
The installer will then ask you to activate your product online or by phone. Choose "Phone Corel" option and click on "Next". You will see an installation code on the screen. Copy this installation code and paste it into the keygen window where it says "Installation Code". Then click on "Activation Code" button to generate an activation code. Copy this activation code and paste it into the installer window where it asks for an activation code. Then click on "Continue".
